Name: BAM-Publica
Comment: Bibliography and institutional repository for publications by BAM scientists

Name: CERN Document Server
Comment: CERN and HEP articles, reports, etc.

Name: mediaTUM
Comment: Repository to publish, archive and research public records, documents, images as well as research data

Name: KITopenData
Comment: Publication and (long term) archiving of research data from participating institutions in Baden-Württemberg

Name: OpARA
Comment: Research data repository and archive jointly operated by TU Dresden and TU Bergakademie Freiberg

Name: Digitale Bibliothek Der Publikationsserver der TU Braunschweig
Comment: Also publishes collections of special interest of TU Braunschweig and regional institutions

Name: Forschungsdatenrepositorium
Comment: Research data repository for researchers at Leibniz Universität Hannover (LUH)

Name: Institutionelles Repositorium der Leibniz Universität Hannover
Comment: Institutional repository open to members and alumni of LUH

Name: GEO-LEO e-docs
Comment: Repository and archive of scientific publications from the earth sciences (including grey literature and maps, amongst others)

Name: Montanportal
Comment: Information portal concerning everything about mining, raw materials, metallurgy, etc., cooperation with FiD GEO

Name: Fachinformationsdienst BAUdigital
Comment: Service is currently being set up, kick off was in September 2021

Name: fidmath
Comment: Provides a central search interface to information sources of interest to mathematicians: library catalogues, preprint servers, journals, etc.

Name: Fachinformationsdienst Kartographie und Geobasisdaten
Comment: Provides resources for research of special cartographic literature; some services require registration

Name: Fachinformationsdienst Mobilitäts- und Verkehrsforschung
Comment: Search interface to various sources relevant to the field of mobility and traffic research, a research data repository is currently being set up

Name: Fachinformationsdienst Materialwissenschaft und Werkstofftechnik
Comment: Integrated interface to MaterialHub and TIB search portal, service is currently being set up

Name: NFDI4Ing Terminology Service
Comment: Repository for engineering ontologies

Name: The Wood Database
Comment: Privately curated online database of various wood species and their characteristics, usage, etc.

Name: Material Hub
Comment: Materials research repository with partners from science and industry

Name: NOMAD Novel Materials Discovery
Comment: Repository, archive and encyclopedia of novel materials, also provides an AI toolkit to facilitate research on novel materials

Name: Database of Novel and Emerging Adsorbent Materials
Comment: Database of adsorption characteristics of novel and emerging materials; includes isotherm visualisation

Name: The Open Quantum Materials Database
Comment: Database of DFT-calculated thermodynamic and structural material properties

Name: openKIM
Comment: Curated repository of interatomic potentials and framework to facilitate molecular simulation.

Name: Materials Project
Comment: Database of computed information about materials, both known and predicted.

Name: OPTIMADE
Comment: OPTIMADE is the Open Database Integration for Materials Design

Name: Computational Materials Repository
Comment: Repository containing various databases of different kinds of computational materials

Name: 2D Materials Encyclopedia
Comment: Collection of (computed) two dimensional materials

Name: Open Materials Database
Comment: Database of (computational) materials properties

Name: ChemSpider
Comment: Chemical structure database; access by API requires an account with RSC

Name: Open Reaction Database
Comment: Chemical reaction database of single-step organic reactions; still in development (12/2021)

Name: Organic Syntheses
Comment: Catalogue of reliable preparations of organic compounds

Name: PubChem
Comment: Database with information about chemical structures, physical and chemical properties, toxicity, etc.

Name: GFZ Data Services
Comment: Research data repository for the earth and environmental sciences, accepts research data as well as scientific software

Name: PANGAEA
Publication Cost: free, but a donation of 500€ is welcome
Comment: Repository and archive for georeferenced data from earth system research

Name: Open Energy Platform
Comment: Collection of tools for and information about energy system research

Name: Open Energy Ontology
Comment: Developed as part of the Open Energy Platform

Name: HENRY Hydraulic Engineering Repository
Comment: Also provides an archive for reports and scientific publications from BAW and WSV

Name: engrXiv
Comment: Eprint server for engineering

Name: AERADE Reports Archive
Comment: Archive of historically significant reports from the Aeronautical Research Council and the National Advisory Commitee for Aeronautics

Name: dblp computer science bibliography
Comment: Bibliography focused on computer science journals and proceedings

Name: zbMATH Open
Comment: Abstracting and reviewing service in pure and applied mathematics, also covers applications in the natural sciences, computer science, economics and engineering

Name: swMATH
Comment: Database about mathematical software

Hosting Institution: U.S. Department of Energy Office of Scientific and Technical Information
Name: DOE CODE
Comment: Repository and archive for DOE funded software (business and scientific)

Name: PFHub
Comment: Includes benchmarks for testing, validation and verification of results, a list of codes, as well as basic learning resources

Name: Dryad Digital Repository
Comment: Curated general-purpose repository, software submissions are published on Zenodo

Name: SciELO
Comment: Database of open access journals from Latin America, the Iberian Peninsula and South Africa

Name: SciELO Data
Comment: Repository for deposition of research data published on SciELO

Hosting Institution: Centre pour la Communication Scientifique Directe
Name: HAL science ouverte
Comment: Also provides access to other repositories of french universities and research centers

Name: J-STAGE
Comment: Electronic publishing platform for academic institutions from Japan

Hosting Institution: Autonomous Vision Group, Department of Computer Science, University of Tübingen
Name: The KITTI Vision Benchmark Suite
Comment: Novel computer vision benchmarks. Access to the data requires an account

Name: SemanticKITTI
Comment: Dataset based on the KITTI Vision Benchmark for semantic scene understanding.

Name: A2D2: Audi Autonomous Driving Dataset
Comment: Labeled dataset from a car equipped with a multimodal sensor suite. The dataset features 2D image segmentation, 3D point clouds and bounding boxes as well as vehicle bus data.

Name: Oxford RobotCar Dataset
Comment: The dataset contains over 100 repetitions of the same fixed route. A SDK is provided.

Name: Oxford Radar RobotCar Dataset
Comment: Radar extension to the Oxford RobotCar Dataset.

Name: Ford Autonomous Vehicle Dataset
Comment: The dataset contains data from multiple vehicles in a variety of driving and weather conditions

Name: EU Long-term Dataset with Multiple Sensors for Autonomous Driving
UrbanLoco: A Full Sensor Suite Dataset for Mapping and Localization in Urban Scenes
Comment: Localization data in challenging urban environments

Hosting Institution: Max Planck Society for the Advancement of Science
Name: The Cityscapes Dataset
Comment: The dataset contains data from 50 different cities and focusses on semantic understanding of urban scenes. Download requires an account.

Name: Level 5 Prediction Dataset
Comment: The dataset contains logs of other traffic agents and is aimed at training motion prediction models. Download requires an account.

Name: Level 5 Perception Dataset
Comment: The dataset contains raw lidar and camera data. Download requires an account.

Name: nuScenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving
Comment: The dataset contains manually curated scenes from diverse driving situations. Download requires an account.

Name: nuImages
Comment: The datasets complements the nuScenes dataset by providing a manually curated set of 2D annotated images. Download requires an account.

Name: DENSE datasets
Comment: The datasets contains scenes in adverse and challenging weather conditions

Name: ACDC Dataset
Comment: ACDC is the Adverse Conditions Dataset with Correspondences and supports both standard and uncertainty-aware semantic segmentation
